channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: HyperSpace Trackpad Pro Hands-On: A Windows Answer to Apple’s Magic Trackpad
item.description: I spent quality time with the HyperSpace Trackpad Pro, which attempts to bring Apple’s Magic Trackpad experience to Windows.

item.title: Alternative app store AltStore raises $6M, connects with the fediverse
item.description: The alternative app marketplace AltStore has raised $6 million and launches a Mastodon server.

item.title: xAI hires former Morgan Stanley banker Anthony Armstrong as CFO
item.description: Armstrong, who advised Musk during his Twitter takeover, will oversee the finances of both xAI and X, which were merged in April, the report said.

item.title: Prime Day 2025 - We’re Tracking Deals Live
item.description: We're tracking Amazon Prime Day deals, trends, and the general state of American capitalism live throughout the Big Deal Days sale.

item.title: The Best Prime Day Pet Deals (October 2025)
item.description: Amazon's Prime Day is here yet again, and lots of our favorite pet tech, from at-home DNA kits to pet cameras, is on heavy discount.

item.title: OpenAI and the race for AI-driven commerce
item.description: OpenAI now has all the pieces in place for AI-driven commerce, establishing ChatGPT as a place customers go to buy and retailers go to sell.

item.title: California bans loud commercials on Netflix, Hulu, and other streaming services
item.description: Starting July 1, 2026, streaming services won’t be allowed to “transmit the audio of commercial advertisements louder than the video content the adver...

item.title: Security bug in India’s income tax portal exposed taxpayers’ sensitive data
item.description: TechCrunch verified that the security bug in the Indian Income Tax Department's e-Filing portal exposed taxpayers' data to other users. The security r...

item.title: I'm a Certified Sleep Coach, and My Favorite Pillow Is $20 Off Right Now for Prime Day (2025)
item.description: Lagoon Performance Pillows are beloved by professional athletes and sleep experts alike (including me), and right now each style is $20 off for Prime ...

item.title: Prime Day Brings Strong Savings on Some of Top Coffee and Espresso Machines
item.description: The best coffee and espresso machine deals to get you wired and keep you wired on Prime Day.
